columns.name: name
columns.description: Azure resource name.

columns.name: id
columns.description: Azure resource identifier.

columns.name: provisioning_state
columns.description: The provisioning state of the cluster resource. Possible values include: 'Updating', 'Succeeded', 'Failed', 'Canceled'.

columns.name: type
columns.description: Azure resource type.

columns.name: cluster_code_version
columns.description: The service fabric runtime version of the cluster. This property can only by set the user when **upgradeMode** is set to 'Manual'.

columns.name: cluster_endpoint
columns.description: The azure resource provider endpoint. A system service in the cluster connects to this  endpoint.

columns.name: cluster_id
columns.description: A service generated unique identifier for the cluster resource.

columns.name: cluster_state
columns.description: The current state of the cluster. Possible values include: 'WaitingForNodes', 'Deploying', 'BaselineUpgrade', 'UpdatingUserConfiguration', 'UpdatingUserCertificate', 'UpdatingInfrastructure', 'EnforcingClusterVersion', 'UpgradeServiceUnreachable', 'AutoScale', 'Ready'.

columns.name: event_store_service_enabled
columns.description: Indicates if the event store service is enabled.

columns.name: etag
columns.description: Azure resource etag.

columns.name: management_endpoint
columns.description: The http management endpoint of the cluster.

columns.name: reliability_level
columns.description: The reliability level sets the replica set size of system services. Possible values include: 'None', 'Bronze', 'Silver', 'Gold', 'Platinum'.

columns.name: upgrade_mode
columns.description: The upgrade mode of the cluster when new service fabric runtime version is available. Possible values include: 'Automatic', 'Manual'.

columns.name: vm_image
columns.description: The VM image VMSS has been configured with. Generic names such as Windows or Linux can be used.

columns.name: add_on_features
columns.description: The list of add-on features to enable in the cluster.

columns.name: available_cluster_versions
columns.description: The service fabric runtime versions available for this cluster.

columns.name: azure_active_directory
columns.description: The azure active directory authentication settings of the cluster.

columns.name: certificate
columns.description: The certificate to use for securing the cluster. The certificate provided will be used for node to node security within the cluster, SSL certificate for cluster management endpoint and default admin client.

columns.name: certificate_common_names
columns.description: Describes a list of server certificates referenced by common name that are used to secure the cluster.

columns.name: client_certificate_common_names
columns.description: The list of client certificates referenced by common name that are allowed to manage the cluster.

columns.name: client_certificate_thumbprints
columns.description: The list of client certificates referenced by thumbprint that are allowed to manage the cluster.

columns.name: diagnostics_storage_account_config
columns.description: The storage account information for storing service fabric diagnostic logs.

columns.name: fabric_settings
columns.description: The list of custom fabric settings to configure the cluster.

columns.name: node_types
columns.description: The list of node types in the cluster.

columns.name: reverse_proxy_certificate
columns.description: The server certificate used by reverse proxy.

columns.name: reverse_proxy_certificate_common_names
columns.description: Describes a list of server certificates referenced by common name that are used to secure the cluster.

columns.name: upgrade_description
columns.description: The policy to use when upgrading the cluster.

columns.name: title
columns.description: ColumnDescriptionTitle

columns.name: tags
columns.description: ColumnDescriptionTags

columns.name: region
columns.description: ColumnDescriptionRegion

columns.name: resource_group
columns.description: ColumnDescriptionResourceGroup
